clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot Study to Evaluate A Novel Gastric Space Occupying Device
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center 60-day Observational, Non-randomized Study to Evaluate Safety and Preliminary Efficacy of a Novel Gastric Space Occupying Device as an Aid for Weight Loss

brief_summary.textblock: This will be an observational, prospective, non-randomized, pilot study to gain initial device experience on a novel space-occupying device in persons who are overweight or obese. No formal hypothesis testing will be conducted.

clinical_study.condition: Observational Study to Evaluate Weight Loss When Administering up to 2 Balloons Across the 60 Day Study Duration.

arm_group.description: One or two balloons administered to each patient

intervention.description: One or two balloons administered per patient

study_pop.textblock: Overweight or obese individuals who have failed routine dieting in the past
